hackathon-description-text: This is a 12 hour hack day focused on storytelling and how we evolve and enhance our stories using technology.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: New York Code and Design Academy

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Amazon Echo devices are awarded to the top winner of Hack Over Passover who excelled in storytelling, design, technical execution and community value overall.
Pop Up Archive 1-Year Subscriptions are awarded to the top winner of Hack Over Passover who excelled in storytelling, design, technical execution and community value overall.
Subscription to Good Street for a month for you and a friend.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Charity Prize - Good St Sign Ups
